block.p: Jessica Lynn Rappaport, a daughter of Andrea R. Smith of North Merrick, N.Y., and Bernard N. Rappaport of Scarsdale, N.Y., is to be married today to Jesse Todd Lubinsky, the son of Leslie D. Papa and the stepson of Vincent J. Papa of Woodside, Queens. Rabbi Gordon Tucker will officiate at the Water's Edge, a restaurant in Long Island City, Queens.
The bride and bridegroom, both 24, graduated from the State University at Binghamton, N.Y., she cum laude.

Jessica Lynn Rappaport, a daughter of Andrea R. Smith of North Merrick, N.Y., and Bernard N. Rappaport of Scarsdale, N.Y., is to be married today to Jesse Todd Lubinsky, the son of Leslie D. Papa and the stepson of Vincent J. Papa of Woodside, Queens. Rabbi Gordon Tucker will officiate at the Water's Edge, a restaurant in Long Island City, Queens.
The bride and bridegroom, both 24, graduated from the State University at Binghamton, N.Y., she cum laude.

The bride, who received a master's degree in journalism from New York University, is the production assistant for ''Entrepreneurs Only,'' a weeknight business program on CNNfn, the financial news cable network, in Manhattan. Mr. Lubinsky is a network consultant for Approach Inc., a computer systems consulting company in Valhalla, N.Y.
